question: some parents worried about increasing level of violence in T.V, video games and other types entertainment for children leisure. how does this affect children . how do you think problem can be tackled?
text: Some parents bothered about their children regarding the rising level of violence in T.V, computer games and other entertainment sources, Which are affecting children in many ways.

Today's world, There are multiple sources of entertainment which you can enjoy in your free time and it may help to get out of stress and depression to feel relaxed. Many of the Children are attracted to Television, Which are showing different type of content like drama, thriller, love, action, etc. But some of the songs and action movies creating violence among youngsters which they likely to take in a same as way as showing in T.V but they don't know that these types of content are not to be followed in practical world. Increasing demand of computer games like fighting games, Create an attraction among millennials which have affected the psychology of many people, Because lot of children play games for long hours which may result to eye strain.

Secondly, the solution to this problem is, The parents should keep a regular check on their children's that they are not playing games for long hours. There are many other sources of entertainment which need to consider and should be taken initiative to follow it regularly. For example, Playing sports will make them physically and mentally good and stable. The increasing level of crimes in  the real world is because of television content which shows brutality and children's admire the same which may  be lead to an accident. It is the duty of the parents to be responsible and should take care of their children.

So, I would conclude that increasing level of violence in different platforms are not responsible, it's the parents who give permission and provide them all the things which  need not to be given  to some extent.
